alt: A crudely drawn scene from Monster Hunter Rise with a Palamute hitting a Great Izuchi. A hunter is sitting on top of the Palamute watching the scene.
Shara Ishvalda from TerminalMontage's "Something about Monster Hunter World" making rapping gestures with its tattooed winged arms
A button that says "Monster Hunter Now!" with the Hunter's Guild crest on the side
A hunting cooking a piece of meat over a BBQ spit in Monster Hunter World
Malzeno from Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak looming towards its prey
Malzeno from Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak spreading its wings
Lea from Monster Hunter World removing a cookied piece of meat and then is shown pleased at the smell. There is white text that reads, "Lea" with a heart next to it
The Handler from Monster Hunter World removing her goggles and smiling at the hunter (offscreen). There is white text that reads, "Handler" with a heart next to it
The Handler from Monster Hunter World making a victorious gesture. The bold text that appears behind her says, "TA-DA"
A cartoony Deviljho from Monster Hunter, quickly transitioning into a more fearsome state.
A cartoony Deviljho dancing with two pieces of blue Drugged Meat
Kulu-Ya-Ku as depicted from "Something About Monster Hunter World". The camera is zooming in with letters reading, "BIRD UP" in capital letters
Aiden from Monster Hunter World. There is text that reads "Aiden" with a heart next to it
